title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 429.1 - General statement
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 429.1 - General statement

State Regulations

Each social services district shall prepare and submit to
the department an annual district-wide child welfare services plan, hereinafter
referred to as the Family and Children's Services Plan or "plan", setting forth
the child welfare needs of children and families for whom the social services
district is, or may be, responsible to assure implementation of the Child

Welfare Reform Act of 1979. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
429.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
